title: 麻烦帮我看看这配置能装光影否 若能...请给我个懒人包
author: kenokko
txt_content:

操作系统 Windows 7 家庭高级版 64位 SP1 ( DirectX 11 )

处理器 英特尔 第三代酷睿 i5-3470 @ 3.20GHz 四核
主板 微星 B75MA-E33 (MS-7808) (英特尔 Ivy Bridge)
内存 8 GB ( 威刚 DDR3 1600MHz )
主硬盘 希捷 ST1000DM003-1CH162 ( 1 TB / 7200 转/分 )
显卡 Nvidia GeForce GTX 550 Ti ( 1023 MB / 华硕 )
显示器 Crystal View CVT4668 ( 18.9 英寸 )
光驱 华硕 DRW-24B5ST DVD刻录机
声卡 瑞昱 ALC887 @ 英特尔 Panther Point High Definition Audio Controller
网卡 瑞昱 RTL8168E PCI-E Gigabit Ethernet NIC / 微星

replies.author: ayaya
replies.txt_content:
Installation Instructions (PLEASE READ!)

This mod requires OptiFine. Smooth version yields me the best fps.

1. Download and install OptiFine manually (preferably on a clean Minecraft.jar, if you've got a modded one already you can give it a shot but no guarantees this mod will work with an already modded Minecraft).

2. Go to the Downloads section and download the Core files for your version of Minecraft. Legacy versions will be added soon.

-Extract the contents inside the archive into any folder (like on your Desktop). Don't forget to extract all files before attempting an install. Many people have been running the installer from within the archive without extracting everything first.

-Open the folder, and run "INSTALLER.exe" (or nitrous.jar if you're not on Windows).

-Click "Install Mods", wait for the mod to finish patching Minecraft.jar. Make sure minecraft.jar is NOT open in any other program (WinRAR) when you click Install. (To anyone with the "javassist.NotFoundException: a(..) is not found in adt" error, just right-click on the "1.0.0 line" in the Installer and disable it.)

-IMPORTANT FOR ATI RADEON USERS: Download and install the latest Catalyst beta drivers. This fixes 官网抄的...没时间翻译，自己看或者基翻把...
